overview: This study guide covers recent news stories, including political developments in India and international events such as the Miss Universe competition. It also highlights technological advancements, economic trends, and social issues.
key_points: Cabinet of CM Nitish Kumar: Analysis of the new cabinet formation.
Miss Universe 2025: Information regarding the competition, including date, finalists, and prize money.
Vivek Oberoi Security: Actor Vivek Oberoi received threat calls and has increased security.
Nora Fatehi on The Tonight Show: Dancer Nora Fatehi's debut on Jimmy Fallon's show.
Miss Jamaica Incident: A Miss Universe contestant fell off stage during a ramp walk.
PM Modi on Natural Farming: What the Prime Minister said at the Coimbatore Summit.
Punjab Chilli Fields: Reasons for the decline in chilli farming.
Jadavpur University: Formation of a team to investigate alleged moral policing.
International Students: Shift in priorities towards ROI, affordability, and jobs.
Maharashtra Politics: Analysis of Shiv Sena's concerns and Congress's solo approach to BMC polls.
US Report and India-Pakistan Relations: The Congress's questions on the US report.
ISRO Gaganyaan Mission: Successful engine restart test.
Realme GT 8 Pro: Launch of a new smartphone with advanced features.
Red Fort Blast: Gaps in used car purchases in NCR.
Pune Development: PMRDA's roadmap for sustainable growth.
Pakistan Airspace Closure: Extension of ban on Indian airlines.

important_terms.definition: Engine used in ISRO's Gaganyaan Mission's launch vehicle.
An Indian manned orbital spacecraft mission.

processes_or_flows.title: Gaganyaan Mission Engine Restart Test
steps: ISRO conducted an engine restart test on the CE-20.
The test was performed for the Gaganyaan Mission launch vehicle.
The successful test is a critical step in the mission's preparation.

processes_or_flows.title: Miss Universe Competition
steps: Contestants participate in various rounds, including ramp walks.
The winner is selected and awarded prize money.

examples: The ongoing political developments in Bihar under CM Nitish Kumar.
The implications of Pakistan extending the airspace ban on Indian airlines.
The shift in priorities of international students when choosing educational institutions.
